sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Glibc-&glibc-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, cp, ln, mknod, mv, mkdir, rm, touch gcc: cpp, gcc grep: egrep, grep gzip: gzip make: make mawk: mawk sed: sed sh-utils: basename, expr, pwd, uname textutils: cat, sort, tr
